name: CrossRacing (Racing Microgame Mod)
description:
Modded version of the Racing Microgame from Unity. Improved Graphics, 3 Mario kart courses with multiple gamemodes!

There are a few knows bugs:

- When the pins in sherbetlands hit the water, the player teleports.

- When leaving a course via the pause menu, you have to hit tab when loaded into another level. (or it wil keep the same screen til you do so)

- In Hell mode, the restart button sends you back to the main menu

If there's anything else, let me know!
